subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The UAW-Ford 500, the next stop in the Nextel Cup series, is at the Talladega Superspeedway on Sunday, and with it comes all the anguish associated with Talladega.
snippet: The UAW-Ford 500, the next stop in the Nextel Cup series, is at the Talladega Superspeedway on Sunday, and with it comes all the anguish associated with Talladega.
